Size stats: 5'7", 158-162 lbs, apple shape, typical size 10 in dresses/pants, Medium-Large in tops, 36C/D bra  Fit: As pictured, true to size  Look/Style: As pictured  Quality: Thicker material makes this feel higher quality than the price would suggest. I was pleasantly surprised as to how nice this felt.  Final Verdict: Very cute, while also being flattering and functional. The built-in shorts are convenient (and provide the confidence to walk around knowing your butt is covered). Can be worn for actual tennis or just as a casual skirt.

This is a cute skirt that goes along with the popular “tennis-core” style trend right now. I’ve been wearing tennis skirts for a while and have a pretty good collection, but I wanted to get this one because I like the extra stripe details and textured waistband this one has. The pink is a cute salmon-y coral, and the pleats give the sporty skirt a little girly flirtiness. The material looks like it’s good quality and it will hold up over many washes. I’d love to get a similar styled skirt in mint green or lavender purple!

This court is very flattering. The wider waistband really pulls in any lumps or bumps and the pleating is very forgiving for the saddlebag area. There are pockets, which is a huge plus. I did not find the material to be particularly soft.

This skirt is flawless! I love it so much! It is pleaded all the way around, and it is so flattering. It is high waisted, I can do anything and everything in it! The shorts underneath make it effortless. You should still sit like a lady!  It reminds me a bit of my middle school uniform, but this is the more grown up version. So beautiful, I want more colors!
Cute. Flirty, lightweight. Good material. True to size

This little tennis skirt is so cute and trendy! I got it for my daughter who actually plays tennis, but it’s so cute that she can wear it for every day wear! Perfect length and the green on the band is very nice. Love all of the pleats - great tennis skirt or to just pair it with a nice little trendy outfit.

Absolutely flattering! This skirt is well-made with quality materials and workmanship. The fabric is very lightweight and quick dry so it's perfect for any outdoor activities not just for specific sports. The design is beautiful, stylish and trendy. This skirt has built-in shorts that has breathable fabric and is absolutely great to prevent itchiness caused by sweat being trapped by the fabric. That's why this skirt is very comfortable. My daughter has worn it all day long and is going to wash it and wear it again.  Excellent product!

I ordered this for me in the XXL size.  I usually wear a size 16.  I am 5 ft 10 inch and 200 lbs.  This skort is comfortable.  It has a hidden cell phone pocket.  I ordered the dark green and like the color very much.  Of course, I am a red head, so deep green is a color I go with often.  I prefer skorts in the summer, and like them to have flare and style.  This one does.  It may be a bit too playful for me at 52, but I'm ok with that.  The material at the waist is somewhat stretchy, and will still work for me as I increase my exercise to love 15 lbs.  It even looks like a draw sting could be added to allow it to continue to be worn should I be successful in getting to my target weight of 170 lbs.  It washed well, and the pleats are cute.  It swings in a fun way when I walk.  I am happy with the purchase and would recommend it to anyone.  It is very comfortable.

This skirt is almost cute. Almost. The design looks darling when it’s laid flat. The waistband feels really good when pulling on and when in place. High, supportive, but not restrictive. The length is great- slightly longer in the back creating a really pretty line….. but then you turn around to see the front. The material of this skirt feels like running shorts. Stiff fabric rather than a fabric that has more movement. That causes the pleats on the hips to stick out and look absolutely ridiculous. Remember those Barbie cakes from when you were a kid? The way the cake “dress” looked comically oversized coming off the waist? Yeah, that’s this skirt. The pleats simply have no chance of laying flat. The left side of my skirt also has a seam that runs right up the hip completely preventing those two pleats from pleating so it’s just a flat spot there. I wanted to love this- I really did- but it looks so silly I could simply never wear it in person. 3 stars if you are straighter in the hip and can maybe make this work.

I got the Heathyoga Pleated Tennis Skirt with Pockets for Women Tennis Skort for Woman High Waisted Golf Skirts Athletic Skirt in Coral, XX-Large. The XX-Large waist is nice and stretchy, and the shorts fit better than most. However, the shorts and skirt were both shorter than I expected. This skort barely covers my butt.  I love the design, with the sweatband-like waist and lighter pleats. Some pleats did fall out a bit when I washed the skirt.  This is a cute, comfortable skirt to work out in.

评论概述: Pleated Tennis Skirt with Shorts Underneath
评论详情: Good quality tennis skirt. I will dress this up with heels for a girls night or dress is down with sneakers. I don't have to worry about being too self-conscious due to it having built in shorts. True to size.
Nice texture, comfortable lining, great tennis dress.

My daughter loves this skirt! I was kind of surprised. It's very PINK, and she's more into dusty pinks, but she likes it. The built-in shorts and pockets are a big bonus too. They've gotten to the point where they won't wear skirts without them unless they're very long. This skirt is cute enough to be worn to dress up a little, but functional enough to lounge around the house or play sports in.
This skirt is really nice. It has beautiful pleats and good stretch. The material is good quality and it looks amazing.

Size Large has a 26" waist, unstretched, and the band is on the firm side, at least if you expect it to fit a 33" waist like on the chart. The shorts are also a bit snug on my 38" hips. I think I probably should have ordered XXL for a looser fit as this was just generally snug and firm all over. Apart from it running too small to fit me comfortably though, it's a nice quality skort, the material looks more premium than it is. The pockets are itty-bitty though, holding about 2/3 of a mobile phone, more of a ball pocket than anything, on both sides.
Really cute tennis skirt , the color was so nice. The pleats were well done and it fit really well.

评论用户: One of our best customers.  R.S.
评论详情: Size is exactly spot on and the skirt is really cute and feels like it is well-made. I didn’t find any seams open but shipping it in a tiny package is not kind to the pleats so I’ll hang it up for a while..  it’s exactly what you hope it’s going to be when you look at the picture, well-made, cute, and exactly the size you ordered with the fit that you’re looking for. You can’t beat this for the price unless it goes on sale lol  If you are really tall, it’s going to get more attention so take some precaution to the way you’re wearing it and you might want to have a little more coverage underneath it than what it comes with so think it over. If you’re not quite to your bikini body, of course it’s going to show that.. It’s not the shortest skirt, but it’s not likely going to be called modest lol keep that in mind with the activities.  And if it does go on sale, my skirt is going to have some company, lol

The skirt is super cute. It looks just like the picture. Well made, decent thickness for the material. I ordered according to the size chart and it fits perfectly. It is pretty short but has shorts under it which are a mesh material.

评论概述: Turns out I do love it
评论详情: Love the color - the purple is a nice periwinkle - the shorts are noticeably more blue than the skirt. It’s nice and elastic and VERY very comfortable. Both sides of the shorts have pockets, but they’re more to for a tennis ball than a phone. The shorts have about 2 inches in seem.  I ordered up, based on the size chart, and I guess I’m glad I did since it’s very comfy. I think it would be nice and flattering with a sports bra or some shirt tucked in.  The only reason this gets rated down a star is honestly - it just doesn’t look fabulous on me. I ALWAYS look amazing in a-line skirts, and have a very “hourglass” figure especially on the waist to hips. However - this skirt just isn’t the flattering look I would prefer. I’ll wear it, but won’t expect to pick up a date from it.  Update 7/9/24: I find myself wearing this at least once a week. It’s just so comfy and I figured out how to make it a cute outfit. I’m considering ordering in other colors I like the style so much. It washes well. It has two pockets most of these skorts only have one). I wish the shorts were a bit longer.
These are the perfect skort. Length is perfect. Shorts stay down, colors are beautifully neutral. Fabric is easy to care for. I love them.
I love that I be in a sport skirt  but feel more dressed up in this skirt
